item.description:
Thanksgiving, Christmas and Hanukkah will be here before we know it!  Let's  get started by creating some unique holiday greeting cards and tags.

 

There will be a variety of examples shown for paper art techniques to make greeting cards and tags including collage, drawing and rubber stamping.  You may bring any of your favorite holiday stamps and ink pads, but many will be provided.   Four cards and envelopes will be provided for you to design.  Please also bring cardstock of any color or pattern and you can make additional cards, envelopes and tags from your paper.

 

Space is limited, so be sure to register today!  We'll get in the holiday spirit and enjoy a day of creativity and fun.  Be sure to bring a friend!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Create Holiday Cards & Tags for Thanksgiving, Christmas & Hanukkah!
